name: Lucy vs The Hawk
description:
A game in collaboration between Let's Learn This Together and UsGinger. Help Lucy defeat the evil Hawk!

LLTT believes everyone can learn with the right teacher. Their goal is to empower anyone to pursue their dreams and accomplish their goals.

USGinger's Sun-dried Clinical Trials Grade product. It is free of all of all levels of discernible radiation chemicals & additives, and boasts a 5:1 potency ratio to imported herbs; founded in 2013, supporting California Small Farmers where flavors meet science.
